name: SheepCounter
0:
”Alexa, open sheep counter.”
”Alexa, launch sheep counter.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sheep counter
des:
This skill has Alexa count sheep in a calm and soothing voice to help put you to bed. Every now and then she will stop to ask if she should continue. If you don't answer that must mean you fell asleep!

To launch, simply say, "Alexa open sheep counter."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
